page.title: 09 Shop Prices June 1985
page.content: We looked at the prices of some of the things sold in our local shops: { Food: }Cabbage 20p a pound Apples 22p a pound Grapefruit 20p each Cherries 70p a pound Peaches 14p each Grapes 68p a pound Mushrooms 26p a quarter pound Tomatoes 56p a pound { Meat:} Minced beef 78p a pound Ox liver 44p a pound Pork chops 98p a pound Pork sausages 62p a pound Steak Â£2.60 a pound Belly of pork 62p a pound { Chemist's sundries: } Hair brush Â£1.49 Talcum powder 69p Deodorant spray Â£1.09 Shampoo 80p Sunglasses Â£7.95 pair
